channel.title: Posts on Arto's dev time by-products
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Arto's dev time by-products

item.title: How to Copy a Collection of Documents to Another Database with mongosh
item.description: If you need to copy a collection of documents from one Mongo collection to another, you can use the mongodump and mongorestore. But if the source database is in the same instance as the target, then you may be able to take a shortcut with mongosh. Here is the script to use: db.<source collection>.find().forEach(function(d){ db.getSiblingDB('<dest db>')['<dest collection>'].insert(d); }); For example, if you are copying all documents from current databases cars collection to a database called another-db’s collection vehicles:

item.title: How to set up a blog with Hugo and GitHub Pages in 10 minutes
item.description: So you want to set up a blog. Here is how to do it in 10 minutes or less. For me, it took a little more time, just to make sure for you it would not. And actually, even for me, most of the time was used to write this post. So here we go, you have 40 for each step. Create GitHub account if you do not have one yet Create new GitHub repository named <your GitHub username>.
